text: Antonio Monteiro is the name of: *António Monteiro (politician) (born 1944), former foreign minister of Portugal * António Mascarenhas Monteiro (1944–2016), former President of Cape Verde * Antônio Monteiro Dutra (born 1973), Brazilian footballer *António Monteiro (canoeist) (born 1972), Portuguese sprint canoer *António Isaac Monteiro, former foreign minister of Guinea-Bissau *Antônio Monteiro (actor) (born 1956), Brazilian actor, director and writer *Antonio Monteiro (mathematician) (1907–1980), mathematician born in Portuguese Angola
title: Antonio Monteiro
